results.author: Pankaj Ghemawat
results.title: Pankaj Ghemawat and Business Strategy
results.content_short:
In this week’s Thinkers50 Podcast, Pankaj Ghemawat talks about business strategy and what he finds wrong with it in today’s business world.
He hits on a variety of topics, from shareholder value management, opportunities for interchange from those in academia to those in practice, and the management idea industry. Pankaj talks about his history tracking management ideas, and how the creation of “salient strategy frameworks” actually has dropped off.
